snippet: The father of a high school student who killed four classmates and himself in October was arrested Tuesday on a federal charge that he was barred from possessing the gun his son used in the shooting.
abstract: Raymond Lee Fryberg, father of Jaylen Fryberg, high school student who shot and killed four classmates and himself at Marysville-Pilchuck High School in Washington, is arrested on federal charge that he was barred from possessing gun his son used due to domestic violence protection order.
lead_paragraph: The father of a high school student who killed four classmates and himself in October was arrested Tuesday on a federal charge that he was barred from possessing the gun his son used in the shooting.

headline.main: Washington: Father of Killer Faces Gun Charge
headline.print_headline: Washington: Father of Killer Faces Gun Charge
